ComicInfo.Penciller: Alex Sheikman,David Petersen,Alex Sheikman,Lizzy John,Janet Lee,David Petersen
ComicInfo.Series: Mouse Guard: The Tale of the Wise Weaver / The Dark Crystal Preview
ComicInfo.Summary:
On one side of the book, a brand-new tale of the fan-favorite Mouse Guard, elite warrior mice tasked with protecting common mice from predators, the elements and other dangers. It's the perfect introduction to Mouse Guard for new fans, and a rewarding treat for existing ones! On the other side of the book, Archaia Entertainment is proud to present an exclusive prelude to its forthcoming series of Dark Crystal graphic novels, featuring covers, art direction and concepts by Brian Froud, conceptual designer of the original film! This prelude begins the epic creation story of the world of Thra, and explores the origins of the world of the Dark Crystal!
https://comicvine.gamespot.com/mouse-guard-the-tale-of-the-wise-weaver-the-dark-c/4000-269673/
ComicInfo.Title: The Origin of the Dark Crystal; Season of the Dapper Men; The Tale of the Wise Weaver
ComicInfo.Writer: Brian Holguin,Brian Froud,Brian Holguin,Jim McCann,David Petersen
